name: Rope Hoops
description:
A little local co-op game for two players using a single keyboard, submitted for the 2-Button Jam 2019.

The two players have to work together, using the rope connecting them to bounce the falling balls into the hoops and make the most points before the time is over.

Both players can play using only two buttons each. The player on the left side of the screen moves using Q and W, and the player on the right side of the screen moves using the left and right arrow keys.

And thats about it, have fun!

Attributions:

Music - Happy Arcade Tune by rezoner on https://opengameart.org/

SFX - Game Sound Correct With Delay by Bertrof on https://freesound.org/

Visual assets by https://www.kenney.nl/
